edu.ucsc.gameAI.decisionTrees.binary

Interface IBinaryDecision


  • public interface IBinaryDecision
    The interface for BinaryDecision nodes for implementing binary decision trees. Every decision node in the binary tree implementation should implement this interface.
    Author:
    Josh McCoy

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      IBinaryNode getFalseBranch()
      Getter for the false branch.
      IBinaryNode getTrueBranch()
      Getter for the true branch.
      void setFalseBranch(IBinaryNode node)
      Setter for the false branch.
      void setTrueBranch(IBinaryNode node)
      Setter for the true branch.
      boolean test()
      Evaluates the decision node's condition and returns the true or false result.

    • Method Detail

      • setTrueBranch

        Setter for the true branch.
        Parameters:
        node - The node associated with the true branch of the decision.

      • test

        boolean test()
        Evaluates the decision node's condition and returns the true or false result.
        Returns:
        Result of evaluating the conditional expression of the binary decision node.
